name: ABC
text: RT @ABCWorldNews: ONE HEARTBEAT: Two families have been brought together after a Virginia teen died in a car accident and his heart was donated, with the recipient alive today because of that gift traveling to say thank you in person. @TomLlamasABC reports. #AmericaStrong https://t.co/pkOle3oiCO https://t.co/9YneJIR79u

name: ABC
text:
Vast crowds of protesters flooded Belarus' capital of Minsk in the largest political demonstration in the country's history, demanding that its authoritarian leader step down.

Demonstrators in the capital were estimated to number well over 100,000. https://t.co/O5lHyDV1SU https://t.co/QYinLDhQVd

name: ABC
text: The Democratic Party is tapping a diverse group of faith leaders to speak at its presidential nominating convention this coming week. https://t.co/AXLZ7BDCuV

name: ABC
text: Jason Miller, a senior adviser to President Donald Trump's campaign, accused Democrats of trying "change the rules" on mail-in voting weeks before November's presidential election. https://t.co/f4YcJDW5ie

name: ABC
text: Mark Rapley says he and his wife Chantelle Doyle were spending the day at Shelly Beach in Australia when a great white shark attacked Doyle and threw her off her surfboard. Rapley grabbed on to his wife's board and began punching the shark until it let go. https://t.co/F0SSGEu57y https://t.co/33lGpn4wkr

name: ABC
text: MOUNTAIN RESCUE: Dramatic video shows the moment an off-duty police officer and players from Dixie State University's football team rescued a woman who was hanging from the side of a Utah cliff after her hair got tangled in her equipment. https://t.co/BFfzTTIiOu https://t.co/P5kHOqanlc

text: The owner of a popular Jersey Shore bar has been charged with violating Gov. Phil Murphy's social distancing laws. https://t.co/cGoi02sya1

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden on the death of Pres. Trump's younger brother, Robert Trump: "I know the tremendous pain of losing a loved one—and I know how important family is in moments like these. I hope you know that our prayers are with you all." https://t.co/y8hcpCiFWv https://t.co/op6qY7BvDu

name: ABC
text: More Americans approve than disapprove of Joe Biden's choice of Sen. Kamala Harris for the 2020 Democratic ticket by a 25-point margin, 54-29%, in a new @ABC News/Washington Post poll. https://t.co/6rYUrmVRqf

name: ABC
text: After the private funeral service for slain Fort Hood soldier Vanessa Guillen, her family released doves in her honor. https://t.co/v0yEOKzVtV https://t.co/3QH3QCiL5I

name: ABC
text: For many Americans, the pandemic-induced financial crisis has brought an onslaught of economic pain not seen since the Great Depression. https://t.co/EZ2YWZ4Wd7

name: ABC
text:
Pres. Trump says "he was not just my brother, he was my best friend" after the death of his younger brother, Robert.

"He will be greatly missed, but we will meet again. His memory will live on in my heart forever. Robert, I love you. Rest in peace." https://t.co/p9WlGBhTVY https://t.co/HXAYw1C11X

name: ABC
text: Duchess Meghan says it's 'good to be home' after years abroad. https://t.co/9D0FeIfrNU

name: ABC
text:
.@GStephanopoulos: Why can’t President Trump clearly, unequivocally say Kamala Harris is eligible to run?

As Trump fans false, racist birther theory, Jason Miller says campaign believes Harris is eligible: “In our opinion it is case closed, end of story.” https://t.co/mo48P0whXj https://t.co/pxlOR9xf8N
